position.marginalia_text: Loci propria natura est ex stillis ibi existentibus, vel in eadem circulo ascendentibus, vel ex seipsa, vel domina[n]tis planeta[e] seg 3. aptior. 98.

marginalia.translation: The particular nature of a position is from where the stars arise, either ascending in the same circle, or from themselves or the dominance of a planet [...?] 3. More apt 98.

position.marginalia_text: Si Septima significat morte[m], inimicos, et rixas, quid caus[a]e est cur et vxores significat [.] Aut tale[s] [de]vemus co[m]m... in se qua[m]da[m] co[n]trarietate[m] [co[n]c.xa[m]] habere, aut co[n] diversitatis redde[n]da. Vide igitus Artemidoru[m] in so[m]nijs de morte et co[n]iugis.

marginalia.translation: If the seventh signifies death, hostilities, and disputes, what cause is there [and] why it also signifies wifes?
